page.title: 15SUTTON PARICH COUNCIL
page.content: The last meeting was held on Tuesday 6 August 1985 at 7.30pm. Tenants were to be notified that rent was due for their allotments. The Church had donated Â£25 towards the cost of replacing two cradle swings on the playing field. Councillors discussed the use of toxic sprays in crop-spraying, and the drainage of West Studdal pond. A new typewriter had been purchased for a cost of Â£76.99. A new village seat had been made at a cost of Â£150. A letter was to be written to Lord Northbourne requesting him to cut back bushes on his estate which were overhanging the road and causing a traffic hazard.
